# Resilient

# Edge

## A business vitality podcast from Deloitte

The way we do business is transforming rapidly. Climate, people, technology, and supply chains have all seen unprecedented momentum toward change. Adapting companies, strategies, and processes to the new normal of agile evolution is a must. The Resilient Edge podcast is a guide to implementing and sustaining change at scale.Li
